subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Cindy Rarick, 47, who has won more than $2 million in her career on the L.P.G.A. Tour, was charged with driving while intoxicated during last weekend's Corning (N.Y.) Classic.
snippet: Cindy Rarick, 47, who has won more than $2 million in her career on the L.P.G.A. Tour, was charged with driving while intoxicated during last weekend's Corning (N.Y.) Classic.
